data.Title: Google Deactivates Russia-Based AdSense Accounts
data.Description: Google says it is deactivating Russia-based AdSense accounts

data.Title: TikTok Adds Group Chat Feature
data.Description: TikTok adds group chats, with support for up to 32 people, available to all users over 15 years old "While people often share TikTok videos with each other in group chats on messaging apps, TikTok is now letting users do so within its own…

data.Title: Google Discover Traffic to Publishers Increases While Other Sources Decline
data.Description: Google Discover traffic to publishers UP but Web Search, News Search, etc traffic to publishers DOWN

data.Title: Google Ads Will Not Pause Keywords in Paused Campaigns or Ad Groups
data.Description: ICYMI: Google Ads won't pause keywords already in paused campaigns or ad groups

data.Title: Google Search to Improve Handling of URL Parameters
data.Description: Google Search to get better at handling URL parameters

data.Title: Google Search Bug Displays "srsltid" URL Parameters from Merchant Center
data.Description: Google Search listing the srsltid URL parameters from Merchant Center - seems to be a bug

data.Title: Bing Develops AI-Powered Search Features

data.Title: Google's AI Search Overviews Prioritize YouTube and LinkedIn
data.Description: Google's AI search overviews favor YouTube and LinkedIn, shorten content, and mostly link to top organic results, a new study reveals.

data.Title: Google's "Hidden Gems" Update Boosts Forum Visibility
data.Description: In case you missed my post from Friday afternoon, I cover how Google's 'hidden gems' update from the fall of 2023 caused many forums to surge in visibility (and NOT just Reddit and Quora). Sure, those two surged like crazy, but many others did too. I'm tracking 97 different…
